name: DownPour (itch) (stingr)
description:
k so I made this game with george its like fortnite but on a beach lol

wasd to move and to look around u use the mouse and um shoot as many enemies as you can and get to the giant red stick in the air and touch it  to move on to the next level.

Credits:

Programming: Paaras Purohit

Audio: Paaras Purohit, George Diab

Art: Paaras Purohit, George Diab, emerson.davy, Batuhan13, Kass & Deku, neon_dust, beewee
